name: Search Shortcuts
description: Binds the 10 number keys to the first 10 results on Google Search

goto-link-1.description: Go to the first search result

goto-link-2.description: Go to the second search result

goto-link-3.description: Go to the third search result

goto-link-4.description: Go to the fourth search result

goto-link-5.description: Go to the fifth search result

goto-link-6.description: Go to the sixth search result

goto-link-7.description: Go to the seventh search result

goto-link-8.description: Go to the eighth search result

goto-link-9.description: Go to the ninth search result

goto-link-10.description: Go to the tenth search result
